sentences.en: Bethanechol is of value in certain cases of postoperative abdominal distention and gastric atony or stasis.
sentences.cn: 氨甲酰甲胆碱对于术后腹胀和胃张力缺乏或停滞的某些病例有效.

sentences.en: Gastric acidity would not prevent the organism from passing into the gut.
sentences.cn: 胃的酸度不能防止细菌进入肠道.

sentences.en: Gastric and duodenal ulcers were noted to evolve from early superficial mucosal disease.
sentences.cn: 在早期浅表的粘膜病变上出现胃和十二指肠溃疡.

sentences.en: Gastric dilatation in dogs occurs in 2 general forms with vastly different clinical pictures.
sentences.cn: 狗的胃扩张有二种类型,只有极不相同的临床症状.

sentences.en: Gastric distention may also reduce lung volume by elevating the diaphragm.
sentences.cn: 胃胀使膈升高也会减少肺的容积.

sentences.en: Gastric juice contains hydrochloric acid to provide an acidic solution for pepsin.
sentences.cn: 胃液内含有盐酸给胃蛋白酶提供酸溶液.

sentences.en: Gastric secretion is reduced in volume and total acid content.
sentences.cn: 胃分泌的容量和总酸度降低.

sentences.en: Gastric stasis may result in nausea and vomiting.
sentences.cn: 因胃潴留而引起恶心和呕吐.

sentences.en: Gastric varices in patients with portal hypertension should be correctly identified.
sentences.cn: 门脉高压病人的胃静脉曲张应该可以正确地辨认.

sentences.en: He suffered from diabetes and gastric ulcers.
sentences.cn: 他患有糖尿病和胃溃疡。

sentences.en: Miners are a high risk group for certain types of gastric cancer.
sentences.cn: 矿工是极易患某几种胃癌的高风险人群.

sentences.en: That was how I got my gastric trouble.
sentences.cn: 我的胃病就是这么得的.

sentences.en: The next most important complication of gastric surgery is leakage at a suture line.
sentences.cn: 胃手术的其次最重要的并发症是缝合处漏.

sentences.en: The right vagus divides into celiac and gastric branches.
The splenic artery supplies the area of the fundus by way of the short gastric arteries.
sentences.cn: 脾幼脉通过胃短幼脉供应胃底部.
